## Upcoming Workshop {style="padding-top: 5px;"}

### Learn machine-learning in Google Earth Engine!

#### July 25th, 3-5pm AEST on Teams

We have an exciting workshop coming up this month; Martin Peikert from Queensland University of Technology will provide an introduction to **Google Earth Engine**, how it works, how to set it up and get started, where to get data, and finally he'll take us through a case study in machine learning land-cover classification.
